mapper.sql: SELECT idx AS push_idx ,platform AS platform ,status AS status ,send_title AS send_title ,send_cont AS send_cont ,send_url AS send_url ,is_all AS is_all ,mem_nos AS mem_nos ,msg_type AS msg_type ,slct_push AS slct_push ,is_direct AS is_direct ,send_cnt AS send_cnt ,send_datetime AS send_datetime ,reg_date AS reg_date ,op_name AS opName ,link_url AS link_url ,target_info AS target_info ,image_type AS image_type ,is_noti AS is_noti ,send_type AS send_type ,push_slct AS push_slct FROM rd_admin.tb_admin_push
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rd_admin.tb_admin_push
AND platform = #{platform}
AND send_type = #{send_type}
AND send_title like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND send_cont like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND op_name like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND (send_title like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR send_cont like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR op_name like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM rd_admin.tb_admin_push WHERE idx = #{push_idx} AND status = '0'
mapper.select: call rd_data.sp_stmp_push_add(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
